name: Anti-Vax Kid Rescue
description:
The game was created at Slavic Game Jam 2019 #SGJ19

In the game you need to defend the Anti-Vax Kid, from angry bacteries - one touch and the kid dies.

Here is a small "How to Play":

1. There are three colors of enemies, each one can be destroyed by pushing them on various blocks, but only with the same color

2. As the White Blood Cell agent, shoot the enemies with red blood cells to push them and destroy

3. Look around, enemies can appear from each side of the map

4. After completing each wave of enemies, the kid survives one year of their life

5. Four enemies are added to their amount at the beginning of each wave

6. When the Kid dies, the Menu screen is displayed

Tomek "Tumok" Bogowicz - Programming
Olaf Gontarczyk - Programming
Mikołaj "Galli" Górski - UI Design and Programming
Artur "ReVvoL" Orzeł - Level Design
Kuba "Strzybor" Stachowski - Sound Design and Music
Igor "Dziobak" Samek - 3D Graphics and Animation

Special Thanks to:
Marek "Pilot" Łukasiewicz
Ola "Zima" Lato

We know that a lot of things are not completed or added yet, but we want to make the game fully playable soon!

Yes, Ray Tracing is present in this game. Download the RTX version if you have a RTX supported graphics card!
